message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, and I'm confident it will meet your needs.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value to me is quite high. Could we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $13,000. How about we try $12,500? I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer.
